page.title: 14The farmer's year
page.content: {SEPT.}Take cows to market. Buy winter feed. Start calving. Start ploughing. {OCT.}Start to drill for sowing. May spray against weeds. Feed cows still at grass. {NOV.}Keep newly calved cows in at night. Put bull with heifers. {DEC.}All cows in. Winter days spent milking, feeding, bedding and shepherd -ing. When frosts come spread muck on ground. {JAN/FEB.}As Dec. Clean out yards every 6 weeks.{MAR.}Top dress silage ground. Fertilizer on corn. Spray weeds. Calving over. {APR.}Turn cows out by day. Chain harrow and roll grassland.{MAY.}Worm animals. Top dress every 6 weeks. Start silage. {JUN.}More silage, top dressing, roll- ing. Buy protein feed.{JUL.}Empty effluent tank. Make hay. Second silage crop. {AUG.}Re-seed silage grassland. Combine barley. Bale straw. {AUG/SEP. Blood tests on heifers not in milk.
